channel.description: Recent content in Free Phones on 0x000216

item.title: Samsung Intercept Brings Free Android Smartphone to Sprint
item.description: A popular new smartphone design combines a 3-inch touchscreen, a slide-out QWERTY keyboard, and the Android operating system. Sprint offers this package in their Samsung Intercept model. Amazingly, you can get this phone for free when you order it online with a new Sprint PCS service plan. There are no additional costs; even shipping is free, and the plans are the same price as in stores. The Samsung Intercept M910 is a fantastic deal.

item.title: For Free Phone Aficionados Only
item.description: Looking for a free cell phone? Look no further than Cell Phone Plan Finder’s free phones section. This site is completely dedicated to showcasing free phones available when you sign up for a service contract. This screenshot only displays a limited selection. As of today, there are 23 free phone models from leading carriers such as Verizon Wireless, T-Mobile, AT&T, and Sprint. The selection includes various BlackBerry models like the Bold, Curve, Storm, and Tour.
